law.catch_line: Subject to the provisions of subsection (b) of this section, the identity of any person who makes a ...

text.section: Subject to the provisions of subsection (b) of this section, the identity of any person who makes a report under § 14-302 of this subtitle shall be confidential.

The identity of a person who makes a report under § 14-302 of this subtitle may be disclosed if:
the person consents; or
the court orders the disclosure.
